<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shepherd of Desolation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3594) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 77</row>

**Archetype** [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Reclaimant Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1097); [Survivor of Desolation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1099)

</column>

---

You know how to keep others alive in the Gravelands' murkiest shadows. Allies within 10 feet of you gain the benefit of Survivor of Desolation. If you are a [champion](/Classes.aspx?ID=4), this aura is a champion aura, even though you gained it from Knight Reclaimant instead of a champion feat or feature.
name: Shepherd of Desolation
prerequisite: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; Survivor of Desolation
